function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased risk of contagious diseases in the built environment due to lack of worker protection and health-care facility concerns.","Impact":"Spread of contagious diseases affecting workers and occupants of built environments, leading to potential outbreaks.","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict health and safety measures, worker protection protocols, and regular cleaning and sanitization of built environments.","Technologies":"Smart HVAC systems, touchless technology, air purification systems, UV-C disinfection, and remote monitoring.","People":"Workers, occupants, and visitors in built environments.","Owner":"Employers, building owners, and facility managers."},{"Description":"Potential for conflicts and disputes in the construction industry leading to cost and schedule overruns.","Impact":"Increased project costs, delays in completion, and strained relationships between stakeholders due to conflicts and disputes.","Mitigation":"Early collaboration, contractual clarity, and effective dispute resolution mechanisms to address conflicts and disputes in a timely manner.","Technologies":"Collaborative project management software, blockchain for transparent transactions, and digital documentation and communication tools.","People":"Contractors, subcontractors, owners, architects, and project managers.","Owner":"Project managers, owners, and stakeholders."}]}
